This tests a utility's ability to parse filter queries.

Query: text
Text: [{"data":"text","negative":false}]
Regex: []
Filters: []

Query: text with spaces
Text: [{"data":"text","negative":false},{"data":"with","negative":false},{"data":"spaces","negative":false}]
Regex: []
Filters: []

Query: -
Text: [{"data":"-","negative":false}]
Regex: []
Filters: []

Query: -text
Text: [{"data":"text","negative":true}]
Regex: []
Filters: []

Query: //
Text: [{"data":"//","negative":false}]
Regex: []
Filters: []

Query: /regex/
Text: []
Regex: [{"data":"regex","negative":false}]
Filters: []

Query: /regex/ /another/
Text: []
Regex: [{"data":"regex","negative":false},{"data":"another","negative":false}]
Filters: []

Query: /complex/regex/
Text: []
Regex: [{"data":"complex\\/regex","negative":false}]
Filters: []

Query: /regex/ text
Text: [{"data":"text","negative":false}]
Regex: [{"data":"regex","negative":false}]
Filters: []

Query: key1:foo
Text: []
Regex: []
Filters: [{"type":"key1","data":"foo","negative":false}]

Query: -key1:foo
Text: []
Regex: []
Filters: [{"type":"key1","data":"foo","negative":true}]

Query: key1:foo key2:bar
Text: []
Regex: []
Filters: [{"type":"key1","data":"foo","negative":false},{"type":"key2","data":"bar","negative":false}]

Query: -key1:foo key2:bar
Text: []
Regex: []
Filters: [{"type":"key1","data":"foo","negative":true},{"type":"key2","data":"bar","negative":false}]

Query: key1:foo -key2:bar
Text: []
Regex: []
Filters: [{"type":"key1","data":"foo","negative":false},{"type":"key2","data":"bar","negative":true}]

Query: -key1:foo -key2:bar
Text: []
Regex: []
Filters: [{"type":"key1","data":"foo","negative":true},{"type":"key2","data":"bar","negative":true}]

Query: key1:/regex/
Text: []
Regex: []
Filters: [{"type":"key1","data":"/regex/","negative":false}]

Query: key1:foo innerText key2:bar
Text: [{"data":"innerText","negative":false}]
Regex: []
Filters: [{"type":"key1","data":"foo","negative":false},{"type":"key2","data":"bar","negative":false}]

Query: bar key1 foo
Text: [{"data":"bar","negative":false},{"data":"key1","negative":false},{"data":"foo","negative":false}]
Regex: []
Filters: []

Query: bar key1:foo
Text: [{"data":"bar","negative":false}]
Regex: []
Filters: [{"type":"key1","data":"foo","negative":false}]

Query: bar key1:foo baz
Text: [{"data":"bar","negative":false},{"data":"baz","negative":false}]
Regex: []
Filters: [{"type":"key1","data":"foo","negative":false}]

Query: bar key1:foo yek:roo baz
Text: [{"data":"bar","negative":false},{"data":"yek:roo","negative":false},{"data":"baz","negative":false}]
Regex: []
Filters: [{"type":"key1","data":"foo","negative":false}]

Query: bar key1:foo -yek:roo baz
Text: [{"data":"bar","negative":false},{"data":"yek:roo","negative":true},{"data":"baz","negative":false}]
Regex: []
Filters: [{"type":"key1","data":"foo","negative":false}]

Query: bar baz key1:foo goo zoo
Text: [{"data":"bar","negative":false},{"data":"baz","negative":false},{"data":"goo","negative":false},{"data":"zoo","negative":false}]
Regex: []
Filters: [{"type":"key1","data":"foo","negative":false}]

Query: bar key1:key1:foo
Text: [{"data":"bar","negative":false}]
Regex: []
Filters: [{"type":"key1","data":"key1:foo","negative":false}]

Query: bar :key1:foo baz
Text: [{"data":"bar","negative":false},{"data":":key1:foo","negative":false},{"data":"baz","negative":false}]
Regex: []
Filters: []

Query: bar -:key1:foo baz
Text: [{"data":"bar","negative":false},{"data":"-:key1:foo","negative":false},{"data":"baz","negative":false}]
Regex: []
Filters: []

Query: bar key1:-foo baz
Text: [{"data":"bar","negative":false},{"data":"baz","negative":false}]
Regex: []
Filters: [{"type":"key1","data":"-foo","negative":false}]
